alert.note: Alert for Cass; St. Joseph (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 25 at 7:28PM EDT until May 25 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM EDT FOR EASTERN CASS AND WESTERN ST. JOSEPH COUNTIES... At 727 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Marcellus, or near Three Rivers, moving north at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Three Rivers, Constantine, Marcellus, Flowerfield, Jones, Moore Park, Corey Lake, Shavehead Lake, Howardsville, Clear Lake and Wakelee. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
